title: Ticket #7240: Create workflow job history file
description:
Generate a “workflow classad” concatenating all the workflow’s job classads. This is needed (?) to help enable Josh to more easily data mine his workflows for failure/profiling purposes.

I think what is really being asked for here is a per-workflow history file.
remarks:
2019-Sep-05 05:12:41 by pfc:
The sibling issue on the LIGO side is here: https://github.com/lscsoft/osg-lvc/issues/62

2019-Sep-05 08:00:46 by bbockelm:
Another direction (maybe a separate ticket, maybe an evolution of this ticket?) discussed with LIGO is simply providing a mechanism that allows the shadow to append the ClassAd to a file whenever it finishes job execution (distinct from when the job leaves the queue).

It's not a history file, but we think it might fulfill the LIGO requirements -- and avoids making the schedd do work.

An mechanism discussed to achieve the ticket as described was writing a tool to go through the history file, pull out all the jobs related to a given workflow, then writing out a summary.

2019-Sep-11 13:57:20 by pfc:
Demoting to priority 4 b/c other more specific history-mining requests are more important (and this is just one potential enabling implementation) and the set work may change the requirements here.

2021-Jul-13 14:25:11 by jlwillis:
Migrated to JIRA ticket HTCONDOR-594. Closing this ticket.
